hero.headline: Join the network where
hero.subheadline: Get matched with real work from serious teams. Grow your craft, earn in USD, and be part of a community that values quality over quantity.

quote.text: Finally, a network that respects my time and matches me with projects worth doing.
quote.author: — Senior Developer

roles.title: Find your place in the network
roles.description: We're looking for specialists who ship. Pick your domain and show us what you've built.

vibeCodingEngineer.title: Vibe Coding Engineer
whatYouDo: Build products through conversational AI-assisted development
Translate ideas into working code rapidly using modern AI tools
Iterate on features with speed while maintaining quality
whatGoodLooksLike: You've shipped products using Cursor, Copilot, or similar tools
You can context-switch fast and communicate decisions clearly

softwareDeveloper.title: Software Developer
whatYouDo: Build and maintain production-grade applications
Write clean, tested, and documented code
Collaborate with designers and product on features
whatGoodLooksLike: You have a portfolio of shipped products or open-source work
You can own a feature from spec to deploy

contentCreatorEngineer.title: Content Creator as Engineer
whatYouDo: Create technical content that educates and engages
Build demo projects and code tutorials
Bridge the gap between engineering and audience
whatGoodLooksLike: Your content has real engagement (views, shares, comments)
You can explain complex topics simply

marketer.title: Marketer
whatYouDo: Drive awareness and acquisition for products
Plan and execute campaigns across channels
Analyze performance and optimize spend
whatGoodLooksLike: You've run campaigns that moved real metrics
You can think strategically and execute tactically

seoAeoSpecialist.title: SEO & AEO Specialist
whatYouDo: Optimize content for search and AI answer engines
Conduct keyword research and competitive analysis
Build and execute content strategies that rank
whatGoodLooksLike: You've grown organic traffic measurably
You understand modern search beyond just keywords

socialMediaManager.title: Social Media Manager
whatYouDo: Manage brand presence across social platforms
Create engaging content calendars and copy
Build community and drive engagement
whatGoodLooksLike: You've grown accounts with real engagement, not vanity metrics
You understand platform nuances and timing

leadGenerator.title: Lead Generator
whatYouDo: Research and identify high-quality prospects
Build targeted lead lists using multiple sources
Qualify leads before they hit sales
whatGoodLooksLike: You've built lead lists that converted to real revenue
You know how to find decision-makers efficiently

salesPipelinesBuilder.title: Sales Pipelines Builder
whatYouDo: Design and implement sales processes in CRMs
Set up automations and reporting dashboards
Optimize pipeline stages for conversion
whatGoodLooksLike: You've built pipelines that sales teams actually use
You understand both the tech and the sales motion

leadQualifier.title: Lead Qualifier
whatYouDo: Review and score inbound leads quickly
Conduct discovery calls to assess fit
Route qualified leads to the right sales rep
whatGoodLooksLike: You can assess fit in minutes, not hours
You communicate qualification criteria clearly

designer.title: Designer
whatYouDo: Design user interfaces that are beautiful and functional
Create brand assets and marketing materials
Collaborate with engineers on implementation
whatGoodLooksLike: Your portfolio shows range and taste
You can ship, not just ideate

aiVideoCreator.title: AI Video Creator
whatYouDo: Produce video content using AI-powered tools
Create engaging shorts, ads, and explainers
Iterate quickly on concepts and styles
whatGoodLooksLike: You've produced videos that got real traction
You can handle the full pipeline: script to edit

virtualAssistant.title: Virtual Assistant
whatYouDo: Manage calendars, emails, and communications
Handle research tasks and documentation
Keep projects organized and on track
whatGoodLooksLike: You anticipate needs before being asked
You're reliable, responsive, and detail-oriented

howItWorks.title: How Jeem works for you
howItWorks.description: A straightforward process designed to be fair and transparent. Your portfolio and examples matter more than credentials.

apply.title: Apply
apply.description: Submit your application with your portfolio or examples of work. We want to see what you've shipped, not just your resume.

getScreened.title: Get Screened
getScreened.description: We review every application personally. If there's a fit, we'll have a quick call to understand your strengths and preferences.

getTrained.title: Get Trained
getTrained.description: Level up with tailored training to match enterprise standards. We prepare you for the expectations of top-tier companies.

matchToWork.title: Match to Work
matchToWork.description: When a project matches your skills, we'll reach out. You decide if it's right for you. No pressure, just opportunities.

deliverAndGrow.title: Deliver & Grow
deliverAndGrow.description: Ship great work, get feedback, build reputation. The better you perform, the more opportunities come your way.

benefits.title: Why builders choose Jeem
benefits.description: We've built the network we wished existed. Here's what you get.

qualityWork.title: Quality Work, Not Gigs
qualityWork.description: We curate projects worth your time. Real products, real teams, real impact. No bidding against hundreds of strangers.

clearScope.title: Clear Scope & Expectations
clearScope.description: Every project comes with defined deliverables, timelines, and communication norms. No scope creep nightmares.

growthFeedback.title: Growth Feedback Loop
growthFeedback.description: Get actionable feedback after every engagement. Know where you shine and where you can level up.

communityLearning.title: Community + Learning
communityLearning.description: Connect with other top talent. Share knowledge, get advice, and grow together in a network that has your back.

flexible.title: Flexible, But Professional
flexible.description: Work on your schedule, but meet your commitments. We value async work and respect time zones.

fairPay.title: Fair, Transparent Pay
fairPay.description: Paid in USD. Rates discussed upfront. No surprises, no chasing invoices.

proof.title: What we value
proof.description: The principles that guide who we work with and how we operate.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Ship work you'd put your name on.

testimonials.quote: Finally found a network that respects my time and matches me with projects worth doing. The teams are real, the work is interesting.
The screening process was tough but fair. It filters out noise. Now I get quality opportunities without the usual freelance chaos.
I was skeptical about another 'talent network' but Jeem actually delivers. Clear communication, good projects, respectful clients.

standards.title: Jeem Standards
standards.description: The bar we hold ourselves to.
items: We only work with teams we'd join ourselves

faq.title: Common questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about joining Jeem.

items.question: Who can apply?
items.answer: Anyone with demonstrable skills in our listed roles. We care about what you've shipped, not where you went to school or where you live. Portfolio and examples matter most.

items.question: Do I need to be in a specific location?
items.answer: No. We're remote-friendly and work with talent globally. However, some projects may have timezone preferences (usually requiring 4+ hours overlap with US/EU times).

items.question: What's the English requirement?
items.answer: You need to communicate clearly in written English. Most client interactions are async, so strong writing matters. If you can read and respond to this page comfortably, you're likely fine.

items.question: How does payment work?
items.answer: You're paid in USD, typically via bank transfer or Wise. Rates are agreed upfront before any project starts. We don't take cuts from your pay — our fee is on the client side.

items.question: What timezones do you work with?
items.answer: All of them. That said, most of our clients are in US and EU timezones. We'll share timezone expectations for each opportunity so you can decide if it fits your schedule.

items.question: What does the screening process look like?
items.answer: We review your application and portfolio. If there's a potential fit, we'll schedule a 20-30 minute call to learn more about you. We're looking for proof of quality work and good communication.

items.question: How long does matching take?
items.answer: It varies. Some people get matched within days, others within weeks. It depends on your skills, availability, and what projects we have coming in. We won't spam you with irrelevant opportunities.

items.question: Can I apply for multiple roles?
items.answer: Yes, but pick your strongest. We'd rather see you excel in one area than be mediocre across many. You can mention secondary skills in your application.

items.question: What if I'm currently employed full-time?
items.answer: That's fine. Many of our talent work part-time or on weekends. Just be clear about your availability so we can match you with appropriate projects.

items.question: Is there a fee to join?
items.answer: No. It's free to apply and be part of the network. We make money when we place you with clients, and that fee comes from the client, not you.

applicationForm.title: Ready to join?
applicationForm.description: Show us what you've shipped. We review every application personally.

trustSignals.noFee: No fee to join the network

shipped.label: Tell us what you've shipped recently
shipped.placeholder: Share a recent project, feature, or piece of work you're proud of. Be specific about your role and the outcome.

success.title: Application submitted successfully!
success.description: We'll review your application and get back to you soon.

applicationForm.privacyNote: By submitting, you agree to let us review your application and contact you about opportunities. We won't share your data with third parties.
